lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: it is an easy way to have a "Do Good." impact on the world around me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businessmen and non-profit organizations market themselves in cost-effective methods, with a particular focus on online marketing.

lenders.name: Jeannene
lenders.loan_because: I would like to try and make a difference in the world for someone less fortunate and who is prepared to help themselves. I am very privledged to travel the world and have seen some struggling families.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeannene works in sales for Qantas Airways along with managing and marketing my sister's art gallery, Cascade Print Room. I love  travel, animals and the arts

lenders.name: Felicity
lenders.loan_because: I love women entrepreneurs, probably because I can relate to them. I am very inspired by these women. They remind me what I am doing – working to support my family. Working because that’s what people do.
lenders.occupational_info: I love the creativity and adventure of business.

lenders.name: Armando
lenders.loan_because: One must still have chaos in oneself to be able to give birth to a dancing star.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me so abundantly that I want to be able to bless others.  I also like the concept of teaching others to fish, rather than just giving them a fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm privilaged to take care of three of the most awesome blessings I have ever received in my life every day.  My children are an inspiration & a joy.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I need to put up money to build my own photocopier and food business near schools in our area
lenders.occupational_info: I got axed recently after our account collapsed but i see tremendous potential in putting up my own photocopier and food business.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Successful entrepreneurs make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a very good initiative

lenders.name: Koji

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I am able to, and because I believe better access to banking and loans will enable people in the developing world to shape their own future.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed, and I want to share those blessing with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage warehouse inventories and transportation for 10 national distribution centers across the United States.

lenders.loan_because: People becoming successful by helping themselves is inspiring.

lenders.name: Terry

lenders.occupational_info: I have taught young children for 32 years and provided workshops for parents in poverty areas in New York City.

lenders.occupational_info: I design and build roads, water systems, and sanitary sewer systems.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people change.

lenders.name: jukka

lenders.occupational_info: Nerd

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a school-grades 6-8-and help students with their academic, social, and personal needs.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.occupation: jack of all trades, master of none

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:40

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I was bored

lenders.name: Avadax
lenders.loan_because: I'm a happy dog and  like to help people.

lenders.name: Karen

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: Preventing accidents.

lenders.name: Pepper, Michelle, Nicole

lenders.occupational_info: Nicole is an 11year old student.  Michelle and Pepper are the Chef owners of a Catering Company.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: No matter what happens in our lives, things could always be worse or better. Kiva makes it so easy leverage extra money so that others can make their lives and the world a better place

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because: I want humans to be successful and support one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I'd be Queen but the title is taken.

lenders.name: Yukie
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.name: Perry
lenders.loan_because: I am doing well in my life right now just like a perfect sunset...I want to leave the world a little better than I found it...

lenders.name: Familia/Amigos del Ligre
lenders.loan_because:
Estos microcréditos son posibles gracias al apoyo de mi familia y amigos.
Os lo agradezco otra vez aquí.
Todo este dinero será empleado algún día (espero no muy lejano) en un proyecto propio. Mientras tanto, este dinero esta mejor aquí que en el banco.
lenders.occupational_info:
Mi principal ocupación empieza después del trabajo.
Cuando salgo de la oficina (y a veces mientras estoy en ella) investigo, imagino y pongo en práctica pequeños proyectos con la intención de dejar el mundo mejor de como lo encontré.

lenders.name: Ordinary Life
lenders.loan_because: Our group is very fortunate and also generous.  As a result we sponsor a number of efforts to help those in need around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: A class at St. Paul's United Methodist Church in Houston, Texas.  We seek to enhance our experience of ourselves, of others and the life we live.

lenders.name: Bram, Tom, Sonja en Ed
lenders.loan_because: we want to help other people

lenders.name: stu henderson
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Canadian and American history to University students.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Lending helps my endorphins flow...

lenders.name: Rob Gould
lenders.loan_because: We need to spread the wealth

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because:
I can.
Helping your neighbour leaves this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide medical health care to animals.

lenders.name: Chip
lenders.loan_because: What I have does not belong to just me. It has been given to my care and if others need it more than I do, I am obliged to share it with them.
lenders.occupational_info: Work and pray to alleviate extreme poverty.

lenders.name: Nicolas
lenders.loan_because: I think people in poorer countries need it more than I do. We are lucky to live in Canada.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful family and the ability to run my own business for over 25 years.  I hope these loans help others reach their own level of success.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company manufactures document security paper products including medical prescription paper products.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: As one of my favorite quotes says, “What you get, give.  What you learn, teach.  Pass it on.” (Dr. Maya Angelou)
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children with autism and similar disabilities to help them learn the things they will need to know to live as full a life as possible.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: Because I had loans in the past and now I am in a position to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Real Estate Broker, helping people sell and purchase homes and business'.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans are a good way for those of us with the ability to reach out, personally, to those who need a hand.  Positive action to positive people via positive management.
lenders.occupational_info:
A retired solder I know the cost of keeping peace and the cost of war. 

Making small loans to people in order to give them a way to advance I feel that I am participating in a way to really help people worldwide.  A way that lets them know others care.

You CAN do something to better this planet, one person at a time, over and over!

A way to fight poverty, terrorism and unrest , all at once.

lenders.name: Nicky
lenders.loan_because: Help those we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Own Business.

lenders.name: Hadas
lenders.occupational_info: I gather client needs, analyze them and design a software system that would fit their needs (using available resources from the company I work for).

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I have money that I can share. It's fascinating to see it go round and round in a giving loop.

lenders.name: Jaakko
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending is a fascinating tool: I very much like it that my contributions can help build capacity for people to help themselves and do this many times through reinvestment.
lenders.occupational_info: Mapping/GIS, technology and international development.

lenders.name: A Friend
lenders.loan_because: It's important to give back to your community. By helping people who are trying to make a difference, I can extend my local community.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach families.

lenders.name: Miran
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.occupational_info: Analyst

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: My Grandmother gives us (my cousins, siblings, and I) money, usually 25 dollars, each Christmas to donate to a charity of our choice. We give a presentation to the family on Christmas day at dinner. This year, and a couple of years before, I chose Kiva as charity to give the 25 dollars to. So far, I have donated to 9 people/groups in about 5 years.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a grade 9 student, I like to curl, and play golf. My favourite subject at school are science and math. I do not like running at all. It's my least favourite thing to do during school, and anywhere else.

lenders.name: Spence
lenders.loan_because: My life's dreams have come true with the help of my friends and my family.  I hope to help others achieve their dreams as well.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: Over time people have invested in me and helped me thrive.  Now I have the chance to help others thrive.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help up instead of hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes and land.

lenders.name: Roxana
lenders.loan_because:
Change has to come from someone, somewhere, at some point... 

"There is nothing more powerful that an idea whose time has come." -Victor Hugo
lenders.occupational_info: Making a small contribution in hopes that it will go a long way.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I believe in women's empowerment through access to capital as well as encouraging their viability as business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: Pam is exploring her talents as an artist.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: Yes

lenders.name: Mary Louise
lenders.loan_because: It is an efficient and productive way to share the blessings I have been given.

lenders.name: Aina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: venkatesh
lenders.loan_because: As a Global Citizen its my duty make a difference in bringing the world out of poverty. This is a great way and gives me Soul satisfaction
lenders.occupational_info: I am information technology professional who has come from a country where i have first hand experience of going through poverty and daily struggle

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info: I support programs that educate the public about health and education issues and encourage them to take action.

lenders.name: Rolland
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the wealth

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to need financial assistance and I would like to do my bit to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain HP Australia's online store. I'm responsible for keeping the product information, prices and images up to date and for setting up online promotions in the store.

lenders.name: Armando
lenders.occupation: in honor of mother Sharon, retired counselor

lenders.name: Kayran
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed within my own life.  I want to share some of my blessings with others.  I love the idea of being available to support and help people who are so vibrant and determined to enhance their own, and their families, lives.

lenders.name: Trish Oleary
lenders.loan_because: My passion in life is to help others. I truly believe that God puts certain people and/or companies in our path for a reason and it is our duty as Gods children to help each no matter gender or race.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at home on the internet. I help people live a healthy life and teach them on how to improve their financial life as well.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: My son told me about this great cause so I asked for it as my Christmas gift .    I like the idea of people working to help themselves and not just accepting charity.    Plus I know the full amount will be going directly to the person in need.     I also like the idea of choosing a friend in another country to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband and I own a business.    Before that I worked as a secretary in education,  in a public school system.    
We are very blessed in our life and with our famliy.    It is nice to be able to reach out to others in need.

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because:
a)It's time to see the big picture
b)Put my money where my mouth is.
c)With a few clicks of the mouse, really make a positive difference in somebody's life half-way around the world.
d) Be a positive force in the world.
e) To help out.
lenders.occupational_info:
I play the drums.
I have a lot of fun playing music locally here in the Pacific Northwest. I get paid to play jazz, salsa, and some rock music. I make most of my living playing music, but I do have a part time day job to help ends meet.
   You know, it really was time to stop thinking about my self. I have to thank Kiva for providing that possibility!

lenders.name: AJN
lenders.loan_because: I can. In a world where so much wealth is bestowed upon so few, I want to do my part to help balance the scales. I want to help.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I was in business for myself and I know the satisfaction of of running your own business
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi-retired, but I owned my own retail jewelry business.

lenders.name: karolyn
lenders.loan_because:
What happens to a dream deferred?
--Langston Hughes

lenders.name: H&K
lenders.loan_because: We are truly blessed in our lives and want to share our blessings with others. Loaning allows us to help others with dignity, by allowing them to help themselves.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: Micro-finance allows the remarkable opportunity for some-one like me in a developed nation to join with others to empower an entrepreneur in another part of the world. A simple and elegant idea making an amazing difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Team leader for Kiva Volunteer Spanish Translators! And co-ordinate and manage a large pharmacy and staff responsible for provision of medications to residents in Aged Care Facilities

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help make this world a better place for my daughter and the other children of this world.

I also like that even though I don't have a lot of money to give right now I can still make a difference with Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am doing one of the most important jobs in this world.  I am raising a little girl so that she can grow to be a strong, confident and wise woman some day.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupation: Post Doc Researcher, University of Birmingham, UK

lenders.name: Lon
lenders.loan_because: I have too much not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm mandated to create good...

lenders.occupational_info: We help people succeed in our business by directing and guiding them and working along side with them.

lenders.name: DIANE
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to help that you feel you really make a contribution and see the results in someone's life.

lenders.name: Bobbi Jo and Matt
lenders.loan_because: When God is doing something great in the world, join in!
lenders.occupational_info: Bobbi Jo teaches 21 children in second grade.  She teaches them math, science, and social studies.  Matt makes machine parts for oil companies.

lenders.name: Nadia
lenders.loan_because: I believe you should "be the change you want to see in the world".

lenders.loan_because: i am able to

because I can................

lenders.loan_because: Me gwine help everyone, man.

lenders.occupation: dog trainer, management consultant, art quilter

lenders.loan_because: I grew up in a home with very little money, and now that I am grown and have a stable income, I feel it is a privilege and responsibility to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, managing the money that our business essentially loans to other businesses that buy our products

lenders.name: daniel scheall
lenders.loan_because: A compassionate KIVA "loan" is an investment in mankind. If our children and grandchildren are to inherit  this troubled planet, we are serving their interests as well.
lenders.occupational_info:
I can see the end of the road now; getting older...
 ..so I am engaged in "catch-up", having lost a lot of time in self indulgence. The concept of lending and re-lending in perpetuity to persons of need can change the world.

lenders.name: Vidar
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all people should have a reasonable opportunity to live a good life based on their income, and without hunger, suffering and exploitation.

lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference with other business owners in different parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are entreprenuers and have been involved in building several types of businesses from the ground up!

lenders.name: Smith
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate the help others have given to help us open and run our healing arts center.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a clinic where doctors and therapists practice natural healing methods.

lenders.name: Brian & Amanda
lenders.loan_because: We believe the way to reduce poverty in the world is through democracy and capitalism.  We support  people who are willing to help themselves.

Brian manages the computer systems for a large bank across Asia and the Pacific.
Amanda runs a small business.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because no matter how difficult life is in Canada, we remain one of the most privileged groups of people in the world.

lenders.name: CruiseCompete.com
lenders.occupation: Where agents compete to offer the best cruise deal
lenders.loan_because: Greater economic efficiency is always possible through better information, greater cooperation, and innovative ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: We operate a marketplace where consumers can select a cruise & receive competing offers from independent, discount  travel agencies.    Customers compare offers, then contact agents via phone or e-mail to ask questions or to book.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I wish help others who seek to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: it's fun...
lenders.occupational_info: a little humdrum.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I feel that this is just one small thing I can do to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing numbers and relationships.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in the power of the individual and the will we all pocess to improve our situation in life.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It is better to help.

lenders.name: Darcy
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate in this country; I want to make a difference in someone's life. The well-being of one affects us all. Sustainable economic development will help contribute to a peaceful world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach businesses and other organizations how to be successful while not hurting nature and while helping people.

lenders.name: buleocean2012
lenders.loan_because: Thanks to NOVA/PBS channel who brought KIVA to everyone.  We were really amazed by the originator of KIVA by helping others in third world country.  We always wanted to help people, who needs financially help.   This is the perfect opportunity to take an advantage through KIVA to help others.  Who knows, we could be living in third world country trying to feed our family with no opportunity in site but KIVA has changed that and I hope it continues to do good work.  Make small changes to lifestyle by not going out to every week and saving and substituting that money to someone who is living far less than we are here in United States was our primary goal.  In our case, we have realized that we definitely have way more than what we really that many people living in other parts of world do not have adequate of amenities like water, food, shelter and most importantly job or any business prospect.  We need organization like KIVA that can support others around the world.   Wishing good things for people will bring true joy in your life... Kiva has been doing awesome job and we will continue to support people through Kiva as long as we can.  I have been a member since late 2007 and it has been remarkable way to lend money via Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an electrical/systems engineer working on hardware, software and communication systems.

lenders.name: Connor
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior at University of Notre Dame.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Doing the right thing to help others is the best way to celebrate being human! We look after others by giving them tools to help themselves be stronger as that leads to knowledge and power that will end civil unrest.
lenders.occupational_info: Hi-Tech worker and hobbist photographer

lenders.name: Aly
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled in Africa and want to give back in any way I can to such wonderful people.
lenders.occupational_info: Raising two boys

lenders.name: Garry and Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a good way to help people make their ideas happen.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a dentist and clean patients teeth, take x-rays to check for cavities and give instructions on taking care of your teeth and mouth.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: People need a hand in becoming self-sufficient and small businesses are the backbone of any economy.

lenders.name: uzoma
lenders.loan_because: i want to produce more casava in large quntity to sell as commercial purposes and also to feed my sblings.
lenders.occupational_info: farming work which required mechanical skill and finance to produce cassava

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that everyone should have a chance at opportunity. If we teach people to fish for themselves with a little help from us we have taken one more family out of poverty.  

There's nothing better for your soul than giving from the heart.

I also have a greater faith in humanity after seeing the amount of loans made each day by people of every  Faith, Color, and Nationality.
Makes me proud to be a part of this Kiva movement.
lenders.occupational_info: Transportation Engineering and Coaching various sports in my free time.

lenders.name: Dawd Siraj
lenders.loan_because: Happines comes from sharing.  with a little heart, we can change the life of a generation.

lenders.name: Maren
lenders.loan_because:
One who is gracious to a poor man lends to the Lord, And He will repay him for his good deed.--Proverbs 19:17

"The King will answer and say to them, 'Truly I say to you, to the extent that you did it to one of these brothers of Mine, even the least of them, you did it to Me.'--Matthew 25:40

A righteous man has regard for the life of his animal...--Proverbs 12:10
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a veterinarian with a masters degree in biology.  I especially wish to support sustainable agriculture and veterinary projects.

lenders.name: Huma
lenders.loan_because: Its easy for lazy ones like me, while kiva does all the work!! thanks folks, you are doing great!

lenders.occupational_info: I run a charitable foundation

lenders.name: frederick
lenders.loan_because: It's neat to cut out the middlemen.
lenders.occupational_info: Primary care medicine

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I believe that providing access to "catalytic capital" will improve the lives of people in developing nations.
lenders.occupational_info: My day job involves interacting with entrepreneurs, so Kiva is a natural extension of that work.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to bless others.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I design pages for a Canadian magazine, take photos and art direct projects for my clients.

lenders.name: Susan & Joe
lenders.occupation: My husband is a School Administrator, and I
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people achieve their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband and I work in American schools internationally, currently in Bahia, Brasil. The lessons are taught in English to locals and children from all parts of the world.
 
Once upon a time, we lived in Burlington County, New Jersey, but now our address changes every two years to a different part of the world. Who knows where we'll be next!

We see there is need, all over the world. Many families want exactly what we want, a chance to provide our families with shelter, food and a better life. 

This program provides an opportunity to those who have a desire to make a difference in their lives.

My goal is, hopefully, one day, to become a Field Partner....I have a dream.





bahiasue@hotmail.com

lenders.name: Wally
lenders.loan_because: I heard how microcredit can make a huge difference in the lives of people who have so little & just did the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm semi-retired & decided to run away from the culture of greed & consumption in Canada. I have a farm in Costa Rica &  donate my time  to good causes.

lenders.name: Quincy
lenders.loan_because: All human beings are part of my family, and I want to make the world a little bit better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a public school in San Antonio, Texas.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I respect all people trying to better their lives through honest work.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel and teach English to better understand and communicate within our diverse world.  Currently, I teach Korean university students.

lenders.name: joe
lenders.loan_because: giving to help create a sustainable world is a life intention.
lenders.occupational_info: Gratefully accepting the inspiration of others, like the stakeholders in kiva.org and ted.com, to energize me to be of service.

lenders.name: Bill and Betty Jo
lenders.occupational_info: Betty Jo helps direct a local non-profit agency dedicated to land conservation and nature education.  Bill serves on state, regional and local Emergency Medical Response teams and is a ham radio volunteer at our local hospital.

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that need the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in third grade,and I am 8 years old,and I like reading.

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because:
I have some bucks I may use in the future. There're people who do need it than me now.
Hope little money makes huge improvement for people's life.

lenders.name: Lewis Xmas Fund
lenders.loan_because: Our family makes donations instead of giving each other Xmas gifts. This year we picked Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: My parents have a family farm, rising small grains and beef cattle. The 20 or so of us (children, spouses, grandchildren and great grandchildren) have different jobs in medicine, law, manufacturing, management, agriculture and labor.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.

lenders.name: Cherylee and family
lenders.loan_because: I am in the business of helping people become healthy, happy and who they really are.  Helping with Kiva loans is a way I can do that around the world.  Every person deserves a chance to better themselves and help make this world a place of peace and love.
lenders.occupational_info: My family and I have milk goats, cats, a dog, a pig and chickens.  We also have a greenhouse to grow food in the winter and we grow a large garden in the summer.  We love to learn about sustainability and put it to work on our little one acre.

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.loan_because: I feel as though this is really helping people in a small amazing way.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because:
I love humanity.

"O Thou kind Lord! Thou hast created all humanity from the same stock. Thou hast decreed that all shall belong to the same household. In Thy Holy Presence they are all Thy servants, and all mankind are sheltered beneath Thy Tabernacle; all have gathered together at Thy  102  Table of Bounty; all are illumined through the light of Thy Providence.

O God! Thou art kind to all, Thou hast provided for all, dost shelter all, conferrest life upon all. Thou hast endowed each and all with talents and faculties, and all are submerged in the Ocean of Thy Mercy.

O Thou kind Lord! Unite all. Let the religions agree and make the nations one, so that they may see each other as one family and the whole earth as one home. May they all live together in perfect harmony.

O God! Raise aloft the banner of the oneness of mankind.

O God! Establish the Most Great Peace.

Cement Thou, O God, the hearts together.

O Thou kind Father, God! Gladden our hearts through the fragrance of Thy love. Brighten our eyes through the Light of Thy Guidance. Delight our ears with the melody of Thy Word, and shelter us all in the Stronghold of Thy Providence.

Thou art the Mighty and Powerful, Thou art the Forgiving and Thou art the One Who overlooketh the shortcomings of all mankind."

- 'Abdu'l-Bahá  from the Baha'i Writings
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student studying to be a Teacher of Social Studies.  I plan to teacher internationally at the middle school or high school level.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I have always been inspired by aspiring entrepreneurs.  In a few weeks I will be getting married.  In order to share the joy of our wedding around the world, my fiance and I have decided to sponsor an entrepreneur in honor of each of the tables at our wedding.  We hope our guests will share our enthusiasm and learn more about Kiva.

lenders.name: Kira's Family
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others succeed in their business ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: We are grain farmers in western Canada, growing canola, wheat and barley. We also have a dog, six cats and three horses.

lenders.name: Kathleen Worsley
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount can help greatly

lenders.name: Marci
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this cause.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Others should have the opportunities I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a non-profit organization that helps people with their housing needs. We help them find housing and then give them advice for when they have problems with their landlords.

lenders.name: Devon
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should have the opportunity to dream and have the means of achieving that dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Challenging but fun.

lenders.name: Mike & Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an IT Director for a non-profit helping to feed children in the United States, my wife is a pre-school teacher.

lenders.name: hahuynh
lenders.loan_because: couldn't think of a reason not to.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: To be a small catalyst for entrepreneurship
lenders.occupational_info: We help organizations create innovative and colloaborative strategies and stay around to help them implement

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Providing "A Hand Up" with  a small investment that can make such a difference for someone in a developing country.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired.  My wife and I  enjoy spending time with our three grandchildren.  Member of local Rotary Club.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: I believe in your ability to succeed and have a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage condominiums is St. Louis, MO.

lenders.name: Moroney Family
lenders.loan_because: I chose to use our Christmas Gift money for the Moroney family to provide a loan to a family in need.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I'd like these entrepreneurs to know that others care for them and support them.  I'd like to help others have the opportunity to make better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage teams that build large websites.

lenders.name: Giannella Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family decided to start a tradition of lending together. We hope to do our part to help others around the globe reach abundance. In time, our great great grandchildren will inherit a better world - Elvira, Joey, Vivian, Cynthia, Rossella
lenders.occupational_info:
Our family came from Salerno Italy. Kiva is a way to give back now that we are living well. From the book: Awakening Social Responsibility
 
"If others are poor, no matter how wealthy we are, we experience the consequence of impoverishment."

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I hope that these people can feel empowered by success.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airliners around the United States, Mexico & Canada

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: This has a FAR better return than my current checking account interest rate.  ;o)
lenders.occupational_info: I make Google Alumni happy!

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: teaching people to believe in themselves and giving them new opportunities can help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying land use planning and sustainability as a graduate student at Arizona State University.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I  am very fortunate and want to share with others who need a little help in making a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am blessed with five beautiful and healthy grandchildren.  I wish happiness and health for all children of the world.   May the earth continue to become more peaceful and life sustaining as hearts soften and we see the beauty in all living creatures.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: we all have a stake in each other and I feel a personal responsibility to help make a difference for somebody else in the world.

lenders.name: Shu
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with so much.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I love my job, it connects me to others and gives me the chance to help while making a living

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: Each one of us can make a difference, and everyone should have an opportunity to accomplish their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a global group of engineers who build computer software.

lenders.name: The Coopers
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping people become self-sufficient, not just giving handouts.

lenders.name: NewOrleansConnection
lenders.loan_because: Love to see hard working people get a chance to be successful entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: helping others to succeed in school, business and life

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro-lending is one of the most revolutionary and brilliant ideas, and that we can make the world more equitable if we all try to make a difference in our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a counselor and I work with people who have had problems and need someone to talk to about them.

lenders.name: Jim (Bud)
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the small business.Communities grow thru them.

lenders.name: Ginnia & Jamiah
lenders.loan_because: We are one world and we need to take care of each other by leaving this world better than when we entered it.
lenders.occupational_info:
Ginnia - I work for the Little Village Community Development Corporation as their Resource Coordinator for the Castellanos Middle School by planning, organizing and implementing after school activities for the students.  I am also a dancer in the Corpo Dance Company.
Jamiah - I deal with the legal side of trade financial securities and am the Financial Director of a community garden nonprofit with hopes of migrating to the nonprofit sector in the future.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I LOVE TO HELP PEOPLE HELP THEMSELVES
lenders.occupational_info: I TEACH PEOPLE HOW TO EMPOWER THEMSELVES

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.loan_because: People deserve more aid from those in affluent countries and everyone has the right to an equal opportunity for advancement.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sophomore in college and hope to help people someday.

lenders.name: Ralf
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering other people.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I have been truly blessed and would like to be more of a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Media & Entertainment Executive

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Because this is a great project and I am proud to be a part of it.  I love seeing and reading about all these wonderful people around the world who are hard working and looking to improve their lives.  Kudos.
lenders.occupational_info:
retired teacher
in the process of raising two great kids!

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy small pieces of companies and then sell them at higher prices.

lenders.name: Jeni
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to the needs of people in a meaningful way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work mainly with young children with developmental disabilities.

lenders.name: Nico & Justine
lenders.loan_because: We like to foster entrepreunership around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I set up partnerships for a large internet company while my wife paints for a living.  We are blessed with 2 lovely boys.

lenders.name: Mickey
lenders.loan_because:
I have been fortunate to have traveled around Central and South America a lot with our coffee business. 

Seeing how hard most people work for such little money I am very happy there is a way that I can personally help out these wonderful people to work towards a better life for them and their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am President and Co-Founder of a sustainable coffee company in BC Canada founded in 1996.

My life long goal has been to do my part in making the world a better place. I can now do it through our business.
